org.ros.concurrent

Class ListenerGroup<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ros.concurrent.ListenerGroup<T>

  • public class ListenerGroup<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A group of listeners.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ListenerGroup(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventDispatcher<T> add(T listener)
      Adds the specified listener to the ListenerGroup with the queue limit set to DEFAULT_QUEUE_CAPACITY.

      Adds a listener to the ListenerGroup.
      java.util.Collection<EventDispatcher<T>> addAll(java.util.Collection<T> listeners)
      Adds all the specified listeners to the ListenerGroup with the queue capacity for each set to Integer.MAX_VALUE.

      Adds all the specified listeners to the ListenerGroup.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public EventDispatcher<T> add(T listener,
                     int queueCapacity)
        Adds a listener to the ListenerGroup.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add
        queueCapacity - the maximum number of events to buffer
        Returns:
        the EventDispatcher responsible for calling the specified listener

      • add

        public EventDispatcher<T> add(T listener)
        Adds the specified listener to the ListenerGroup with the queue limit set to DEFAULT_QUEUE_CAPACITY.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add
        Returns:
        the EventDispatcher responsible for calling the specified listener

      • addAll

        public java.util.Collection<EventDispatcher<T>> addAll(java.util.Collection<T> listeners,
                                              int limit)
        Adds all the specified listeners to the ListenerGroup.
        Parameters:
        listeners - the listeners to add
        limit - the maximum number of events to buffer
        Returns:
        a Collection of EventDispatchers responsible for calling the specified listeners

      • addAll

        public java.util.Collection<EventDispatcher<T>> addAll(java.util.Collection<T> listeners)
        Adds all the specified listeners to the ListenerGroup with the queue capacity for each set to Integer.MAX_VALUE.
        Parameters:
        listeners - the listeners to add
        Returns:
        a Collection of EventDispatchers responsible for calling the specified listeners

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        the number of listeners in the group

      • signal

        public void signal(SignalRunnable<T> signalRunnable)
        Signals all listeners.

        Each SignalRunnable is executed in a separate thread.

      • signal

        public boolean signal(SignalRunnable<T> signalRunnable,
             long timeout,
             java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Signals all listeners and waits for the result.

        Each SignalRunnable is executed in a separate thread. In the event that the SignalRunnable is be dropped from the EventDispatcher's queue and thus not executed, this method will block for the entire specified timeout.

        Returns:
        true if all listeners completed within the specified time limit, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
